terra.shell.emulation.concurrency.math.cluster

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • terra.shell.emulation.concurrency.math.cluster.ConnectionManager

  • public final class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages connections to JSH's Cluster Node Network. Used to send, receive, and monitor all Clustering interactions
    Author:
    schirripad@moravian.edu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionManager()
      Configure ConnectionManager, INIT LocalServer, run serviceScan

    • Method Detail

      • queueProcess

        public boolean queueProcess(JProcess p,
                            java.io.OutputStream out,
                            java.io.InputStream in)
        Queue a JProcess to be serialized and sent to another Node for processing. This uses a sorting algorithm based on each Nodes ping, and delta since last usage time, prioritizing low-ping, low-usage nodes.
        Parameters:
        p - JProcess to be sent
        out -
        in -
        Returns:
        True if process is succesfully queued, false otherwise

      • sendToAll

        public boolean sendToAll(JProcess p,
                         java.io.OutputStream out,
                         java.io.InputStream in)
        Send a JProcess to all known Nodes, ignoring the sorting algorithm
        Parameters:
        p - JProcess to be sent
        out -
        in -
        Returns:
        True if process is sent successfully to all nodes, otherwise false. Can be false if only one out 'n' Nodes fails
